sub_title: | Business Process Consultant | Process Manager | Team Leadership | Business Transformation | Change Management |
summary:
Hi, I’m Rosa Gabriela Renteria, My Why? Make it simple, and how it can be simplified and keep it up and running? I'm an experiences Business Process Consultant with proven results on systems releases and deployment to markets. 
 
Throughout my career I’ve achieved numerous success for my ability to connect with different cultures and people throughout all levels of the organization, identifying their strengths and creating unity under common goals. People and process are key factors in maximizing profitability. I’m dedicated to ensuring the right people stay motivated and the right processes are in place to achieve seamless operations and customer satisfaction. Whether it be harnessing my technical and process improvements skills in integrating CRM and ERP solutions or energizing teams throughout the project process, I have the right tools to drive success.
I'm a European citizen, with Italian Passport.

awards.title: Top Service Leader LATAM 2017

Best service leader in Latin America.
For helping to increase the quality of service and trust with our customers.

courses.name: Consultant in Human Strategies Systems, specialization in Problem Solving Methodology, Education Center, Centro de Valores S.C, Mexico

profile_positions.description: Construct and develop new process capabilities and process definition for quoting and order management areas described in Aris system for all markets involved in the NPI2Cash program.  Collaborate cross-functionally to ensure success releases via UAT process implemented in the Markets. Providing and creating training materials for global markets. Deploying and onboarding new markets into new Philips operational systems. Safeguard KPI’s implementation on 360 quoting and order management dashboards to secure adaptation process. Manage different levels of stakeholders, creating and presenting results on internal project progress, using different reporting tools.
profile_positions.title: Business Process Expert - Opportunity to Order

profile_positions.description: Construct capabilities inside our distributors to growth customer experience in countries where Philips does not have a direct presence. Coordinating training for Field Engineers in technical and commercial aspects of new products and effective service contracts sales techniques, identifying areas to deliver more value to existing clients. Collaborate cross-functionally to ensure contracts and proposals are properly entered into organizational database and securely maintained, monitoring KPI dashboards for new services business opportunities.
profile_positions.title: Indirect Channel Service Operation Manager, Africa Market

profile_positions.description:
Directed and guided team of ten Field, Back-Office, and Warehouse Engineers in the provision of service operations and comprehensive projects for 15 service 3rd party providers across Latin America. Oversaw daily and financial operations, utilizing MS Dynamics AX to monitor performance against KPIs and key metrics. Led the development of project proposals, defining scope and deliverables and assigning tasks. Collaborated cross-functionally to ensure successful delivery.
Supported business development by prospecting business with existing clients and identifying areas to deliver more value to existing clients. Earned recognition as Top Service Leader in Latin America for diligence in increasing quality of service and trust with customers.
profile_positions.title: Service Delivery Manager

profile_positions.description: Spearheaded CRM and ERP implementation from SAP to MS Dynamics AX and Service Max for the Customer Service Department while leading and guiding team of 12 across Mexico, Argentina, and Brazil. Effectively managed scope and initiated scope controls and change management processes.  Defined requirements and needs, actively listening to clients to identify challenges and barriers. Recognized individual strengths to assign tasks and cultivated a productive culture. Delivered project on-time, under-budget and within client requirements. Earned commendation for leadership and performance management.
profile_positions.title: CRM and ERM Implementation Project Lead

profile_positions.description: Led team of four in Mexico and Argentina and oversaw organizational contract development and management activities, enforcing organizational principles of integrity and compliance. Ensured contracts and proposals are properly entered into organizational database and securely maintained. Developed contract standards, including payment terms, general languages, and provisions. Monitored KPI dashboard for new and contracts and renewals; integrated continuous improvements for service agreement sales and administration.
profile_positions.title: Contract Manager, Mexico and Argentina

profile_positions.description: Held vital role of managing and sustaining customer relationships. Utilized excellent customer service and client management skills to ensure satisfaction and deliver solutions. Conducted needs assessments to identify challenges. Prepared quotations, sales analysis, reporting and forecasts. Drive customer expectations, liaising with procurement, logistics, and back-office operations to achieve consistency and top quality.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Representative and  Project Engineer

profile_positions.description: Identified product defects, conducted root cause analysis, and delivered changes for affects parts in the technical environment. Designed and deployed new improvements on line production; validated new documentation guidelines for production processes versus team documentation.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Change Analyst
